Html:
I see people already have started to create typescript interface definitions for several javascript libraries.. unfortunately there is no single place where to find them (github, codeplex,...)

So, until there is an alternative, i would call to everyone who is creating such definitions to list them here.

I just uploaded the declarations files for underscore to github (https://github.com/alvivi/typescript-underscore). I hope to upload soon underscore.string declarations and I am working to create ones for Titanium (Appcelerator).
We're working with ideas on how best to handle the .d.ts files for various libraries.  Agreed that we need an easy way to get to them.

Here I commited all the definitions from the TypeScript's samples:

https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped

Also added are Modernizr and Underscore. Backbone and Knockout in progress.

Found this one on github :

TypeScript-Knockout.d.js : https://github.com/sv01a/TypeScript-Knockoutjs

@borisyankov : Looks like a bit more advanced than yours. Perhaps you could merge it in your repository.
